description:
Repairs on the time machine continue, so Future Trunks goes to visit an old friend. However, times have changed, and the reunion isn’t quite what he expected.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitei Saikai: Son Gohan to "Mirai" Trunks
Teacher and Student Reunited: Son Gohan and "Future" Trunks
Wiedersehen von Lehrer und Schüler! – Gohan und Trunks aus der Zukunft!
師弟再会 孫悟飯と"未来"トランクス
